text: #TheFlashMovie used a #SnyderVerse character to manipulate the story that fans keep asking you to finish. @wbpictures @DCOfficial if y'all didn't like those numbers... I imagine this new "Superman" will be ignored just as well! $WBD #HenryCavillisSuperman #RestoreTheSnyderVerse

text:
Ever wondered how one film can tank a Fortune 500 company’s share price?

Here’s how $WBD (Warner Bros) lost 12% of its share price just days into releasing its new superhero film, ‘The Flash’.
author: Shares

text: $DIS is a stinking POS. $PARA and $WBD have the most risk/reward potential. $CMCSA is solid but already too $$$ to imagine any growth worth the risk. $NFLX stands alone as being the best and still having room to double from here.
